item.title: 随着印度快速商务的迅猛发展，亚马逊在印度的目标是 "更快更快"。
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，Sankalp Phartiyal 将探讨亚马逊面临的任务，在竞争激烈的印度市场，亚马逊正试图与提供更快送货服务的本地后起之秀并驾齐驱。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Sankalp Phartiyal looks at the task ahead for Amazon as it tries to keep pace with local upstarts offering far faster delivery in the hotly competitive Indian market.】

item.title: 欧洲央行在通胀率达到 2% 后为 "更不稳定 "做好准备
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天，我们将探讨欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）政策制定者在葡萄牙务虚会上的通胀前景。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at the inflation outlook for policymakers meeting at the European Central Bank’s retreat in Portugal. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 这个非洲小国面临特朗普的最高关税
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布的全面关税截止日期前的最后一周，美国贸易不平衡大国的贸易额以千亿美元计，成为头条新闻的主角。【原文：Big countries with US trade imbalances measured in the hundreds of billions of dollars are dominating the headlines in the final week before President Donald Trump’s universal tariff deadline.】

item.title: 伊朗拒绝核监测员的策略让人想起冷战时期
item.description: 在上个月以色列和美国发动袭击之后，伊朗比以往任何时候都更加严密地保护自己的核野心，这使得伊斯兰共和国与华盛顿的外交摊牌变得更加模棱两可。【原文：Iran is keeping its nuclear ambitions more closely guarded than ever after last month’s attacks by Israel and the US, introducing additional ambiguity to the Islamic Republic’s diplomatic showdown with Washington.】

item.title: 加纳计划略微提高可可农场交货价，因为塞地在上涨
item.description: 在当地货币对美元的汇率今年上涨了 42% 之后，加纳正计划在下一季小幅提高支付给可可种植者的价格。【原文：Ghana is planning to raise the price it pays to cocoa farmers for their beans just slightly in the next season, after the local currency gained 42% against the dollar this year.】

item.title: 增长前景光明，银行股飙升
item.description:
降低利率的前景有助于提高贷款机构的股价

。【原文：

Prospects for lower interest rates are helping lenders’ shares

】

item.title: 尽管燃料价格上涨，巴基斯坦 6 月通胀仍有所缓解
item.description: 巴基斯坦的通胀率在 6 月份略有下降，这为希望加强经济应对地缘政治不利因素的政策制定者提供了一些宽慰。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation eased slightly in June, providing some relief for policymakers looking to bolster the economy tackling geopolitical headwinds.】

item.title: 交易员支持梅洛尼，意大利债券利差降至 15 年低点
item.description: 意大利与德国的债券利差已缩小到 2010 年以来的最小值，因为投资者押注总理乔治亚-梅洛尼领导下的政治稳定时代将持续下去。【原文：Italy’s bond spread over Germany has shrunk to the smallest since 2010 as investors bet that the era of political stability under Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni will continue.】

item.title: 德意志银行力争在 2026 年推出加密货币托管服务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）计划明年推出数字资产托管服务，并已邀请加密货币交易所比特熊猫（Bitpanda）的技术部门帮助建立这项服务。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG plans to launch its digital assets custody service next year and has enlisted crypto exchange Bitpanda’s technology unit to help build the offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚中央银行称林吉特由市场决定
item.description: 马来西亚中央银行（Bank Negara Malaysia）表示，林吉特汇率由市场决定，央行的衍生品头寸用于管理流动性状况。【原文：Bank Negara Malaysia said the ringgit’s exchange rate is market-determined and that the central bank’s derivative positions are used to manage liquidity conditions.】

item.title: 日本央行新任董事表示支持上田的谨慎立场
item.description: 日本央行新任董事会成员增寿和幸表示，他支持行长上田一夫渐进、谨慎的加息方式。【原文：New Bank of Japan Board Member Kazuyuki Masu indicated that he backs Governor Kazuo Ueda’s gradual and cautious approach for raising interest rates.】

item.title: 在曾经繁荣一时的美国市场，房屋销售时间越来越长
item.description: 在整个 "阳光地带 "曾经繁荣一时的住宅区，未售出的房屋在市场上滞留数周之久，正在成为一种新的现实。【原文：A buildup of unsold houses sitting on the market for weeks is becoming a new reality in once-booming housing areas across the Sun Belt.】

item.title: 高盛称美股涨势将持续至八月消退
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）的流动性专家表示，受流动性改善、波动性崩溃、经济衰退担忧消退以及季节性因素的刺激，本月美国 500 指数将继续上涨，然后开始回落。【原文：The S&P 500 will add to its rally this month, spurred higher by improving liquidity, collapsing volatility, fading recession fears and seasonal factors, and then start to fade, according to flow specialists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话前国债收益率降至两个月最低水平
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔周二发表讲话之前，美国国债收益率跌至两个月来的最低水平，降息的政治压力与日俱增。【原文：US Treasury yields fell to the lowest level in two months before Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell speaks Tuesday, amid growing political pressure to cut interest rates.】

item.title: Netflix 的高估值让看涨的投资者也感到紧张
item.description: Netflix Inc. 的投资者面临着一个两难选择：是继续押注这只在过去一年中实现了最佳回报的股票，还是重新考虑这只看起来越来越像完美定价的股票。【原文：Netflix Inc. investors face a dilemma: Continue to bet on a stock that has delivered best-in-class returns over the past year or reconsider shares that increasingly look like they’re priced for perfection.】

item.title: 欧元兑美元迎来二十年来最佳连胜势头
item.description: 欧元即将创下二十多年来对美元最长的连胜纪录，期权交易员们押注这一涨势尚未结束。【原文：The euro is on the verge of its longest winning streak against the dollar in more than two decades — and options traders are betting the rally isn’t over yet.】

item.title: 卡尼让特朗普在寻求更大协议的过程中取得贸易小胜
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）给美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）带来了一场胜利，希望能在贸易谈判中取得更大的成果。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney handed US President Donald Trump a win in the hope of making bigger gains in trade negotiations.】

item.title: 美国大型银行飙升至历史新高，对冲基金大举进场
item.description: 美国的贷款机构正在大涨，对冲基金也在疯狂抢购股票，这凸显出华尔街越来越坚信，他们破纪录的涨势还有更大的空间。【原文：US lenders are on a tear and hedge funds are snapping up shares at a furious pace, underscoring Wall Street’s increasing conviction that their record-breaking rally has more room to run.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚预算赤字占国内生产总值的 2.78%，接近法定上限
item.description: 由于税收疲软和总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）优先计划的加速实施，印尼预计今年的预算赤字将大大增加。【原文：Indonesia expects to post a much bigger budget deficit this year due to weak revenue collections and the acceleration of President Prabowo Subianto’s priority programs.】

item.title: 停电和火灾警报在危机发生前数小时从家庭传感器中闪现
item.description:
利用家庭传感器和人工智能，Whisker 实验室开发出了快速跟踪电力流以检测电网故障的新方法—；这让一些电力供应商望尘莫及

。【原文：

Leveraging home sensors and AI, Whisker Labs has developed new ways to rapidly track electricity flows to detect grid faults — leaving some power providers trailing

】

item.title: 黄金帮助加拿大股票基准指数超越 S&P 500 指数
item.description: 尽管贸易紧张局势持续，经济疲软，但由于黄金涨势破纪录，加拿大的主要股票基准在上半年超过了美国的股票基准。【原文：Despite ongoing trade tensions and a weakening economy, Canada’s main stocks benchmark outshone its US counterpart in the first half thanks to a record-breaking gold rally.】

item.title: 当地需求改善，南非工厂情绪高涨
item.description: 由于当地需求的复苏促进了新销售额的增长，6 月份南非制造商的情绪有所好转。【原文：Sentiment among South African manufacturers improved in June as a recovery in local demand boosted new sales.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率走高，达到欧洲央行 2% 的目标
item.description: 欧元区的通胀率在 6 月份达到了欧洲中央银行的目标，从而加强了暂停长达一年之久的降息行动的理由。【原文：Euro-area inflation settled at the European Central Bank’s target in June, strengthening arguments to press pause on a year-long campaign of interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 中国誓言抑制激烈竞争，建立统一市场
item.description: 中国最高领导层已承诺遏制企业间激烈的价格竞争，旨在加快建立全国统一市场，帮助拉动内需。【原文：China’s top leadership has pledged to curb aggressive price competition among businesses, aiming to accelerate efforts toward a unified national market to help boost domestic demand.】

item.title: 欧洲首次公开募股银行家寄希望于秋季窗口期，因为经济复苏乏力
item.description: 在经历了十多年来欧洲首次公开募股最缓慢的上半年之后，交易商们寄希望于今年晚些时候的几笔大型交易能重新点燃市场。【原文：After the slowest first half for European initial public offerings in more than a decade, dealmakers are banking on several large transactions to reignite the market later this year.】

item.title: 彼得-蒂尔支持的金融科技投资者出售 7000 万美元的 Wise 公司股份
item.description: 由彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）支持的金融科技基金 Valar Ventures 出售了近 5000 万英镑（6880 万美元）的 Wise Plc 股份，退出了其作为该国际支付公司早期投资者之一而建立的地位。【原文：Valar Ventures, a fintech fund backed by Peter Thiel, sold a nearly £50 million ($68.8 million) stake in Wise Plc, exiting a position it built as one of the international payments firm’s early investors.】

item.title: 英国央行行长贝利暗示将放缓QT债券销售步伐
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，由于市场对较长期国债的需求存在疑问，英国央行正在考虑未来一年卸载的国债数量可能少于目前1000亿英镑（约合1380亿美元）的年卸载率。【原文：The Bank of England is looking at the possibility of offloading fewer government bonds over the coming year than the current £100 billion ($138 billion) annual run-off rate amid questions about market demand for longer-dated government debt, Governor Andrew Bailey said.】

item.title: 英国制造业降幅放缓至特朗普加征关税前水平
item.description: 英国工厂活动的下降速度为 1 月份以来最慢，乐观情绪有所改善，这表明在经历了国内增税和全球关税的双重打击后，该行业正在趋于稳定。【原文：UK factory activity declined at its slowest pace since January and optimism improved, in signs that the sector is stabilizing after the double whammy of domestic tax increases and global tariffs.】

item.title: 参议院删除税收法案中限制州人工智能监管的条款
item.description: 参议院否决了一项有争议的阻止美国各州监管人工智能的努力，在一项妥协方案失败后，最大科技公司的批评者赢得了胜利。【原文：The Senate killed a controversial effort to prevent US states from regulating artificial intelligence, delivering a win for critics of the biggest tech companies after a compromise proposal collapsed.】

item.title: 南非顶级家禽生产商开始接种禽流感疫苗
item.description: Astral Foods Ltd.是南非收入最大的家禽生产商之一，在获得南非农业部门的批准后，该公司将开始为鸡接种禽流感疫苗。【原文：Astral Foods Ltd., one of South Africa’s biggest poultry producers by revenue, will start vaccinating chickens against bird flu after getting approval from the nation’s agriculture department.】
